programme.title: Wild City: Forest Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough narrates the award-winning Wild City series that explores the wild side of Singapore. Here on the fringes of the city, the jungle harbours some fascinating species, including many that have never been filmed before. The star of the show is the Raffles' banded langur, one of the least-known primates on the planet. Found only in Singapore and Malaysia, there are only a few hundred left and around 60 have made a home in Singapore's rainforests.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

programme.desc: Puss fights the Duchess to retrieve the first coin he ever took from the Treasure House, which can help him restore San Lorenzo's protective spell.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free

programme.desc: Satin and Chenille put on a fashion show to impress the trendsetter of Troll VillagePoppy and Branch start a massive villagewide pillow battle to determine who gets the pillow of destiny.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Rumors of scary sea monsters in the East End take the kids on a journey of discovering you shouldn’t believe everything you hear. / Mysterious globs disturbing the ocean turn out to be the byproduct of food from Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch pretend to be their favorite comic book heroes and help the dogs of Pawston. But when Frank and Beans pretend to be villains it’s up to Chaser and Chewer to stop the trouble makers and save the day. \ It’s Bring Your Own Bowl Night at the Barker house, and Tag and Grandmaw team up to make Great Great Auntie Eunice's Famous Far Fetched Cookies. But the obscure ingredients are hard to find, so they have to team up and go on an adventure.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Rodney heads to the Community Center for Junior Security Cadet picture day, TZG secretly helps him stay neat and clean for the photo shoot. / When Luis worries about his first ever math test, TZG secretly helps steady his nerves.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po, the kids, and the new Panda Guardians must work together to defeat Jindiao once and for all, and get a visit from an unlikely source

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally “loses” Mini-Morty. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: The gang competes to see who can best train a Terrible Terror, while Alvin is closing in on Berk.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Oh's family reunion ends up turning into a disastrous family Tip and Oh secretly turn Lucy's craft store into a trendy new Boovian restaurant.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. // Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: The crew uses Lightning Bitbugs to light up the garage when Dozer needs a late-night repair, but need a new plan after Scrapadactyls attack.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: When a mother kangaroo hops away with Wally's hat on her head and Fritz in her pouch, Wally, Wenda and Odlulu must work together. They use the Talk to Animals Keys to track the runaway kangaroo through the Australian Outback.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Zebby is upset when Raa Raa laughs at her rumbling tummy and runs off to hide. Raa Raa sets out to find his friend and apologise… he thinks it will be easy, he just has to listen out for the sound of her tummy, but who knew how many other rumbling noises there were?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Something very strange is happening in Brickabuild. Clockwork Mouse is giving all sorts of confusing orders to the builders and everything is chaos. Noddy realises that someone has put sticky putty on her clockwork key and it's making her run slowly. Noddy decides to investigate and find out who could have tried to damage the little mouse. Following all the clues and keeping track of all the evidence in his WhoWhatWhere Tablet, Noddy finds that the trail leads him to Carlton! But Carlton adores Clockwork Mouse! Noddy discovers that poor Carlton didn't meant to damage her; he just wanted to help her rest and not work so hard. Noddy has a brilliant idea. If Clockwork Mouse and Carlton work together, they can get all their jobs finished in half the time. And then there'll be plenty of time to rest – and play! Good idea Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi has invited the other tots over to lunch but she is not very well. Bumble gamely steps in and offers to cook for her. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells a tale about unicorns sailing in ships on clouds in search of Unicorn Land.

He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally “loses” Mini-Morty. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: The gang competes to see who can best train a Terrible Terror, while Alvin is closing in on Berk.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When different species of dragons are found on Dragon Island, the kids suspect that the Screaming Death might be back and it's up to an unlikely hero to save the day.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: While searching for traps, Tuffnut, Barf and Belch get trapped themselves… and a forest fire is approaching.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Oh's family reunion ends up turning into a disastrous family Tip and Oh secretly turn Lucy's craft store into a trendy new Boovian restaurant.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. // Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: The crew uses Lightning Bitbugs to light up the garage when Dozer needs a late-night repair, but need a new plan after Scrapadactyls attack.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: When a mother kangaroo hops away with Wally's hat on her head and Fritz in her pouch, Wally, Wenda and Odlulu must work together. They use the Talk to Animals Keys to track the runaway kangaroo through the Australian Outback.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Zebby is upset when Raa Raa laughs at her rumbling tummy and runs off to hide. Raa Raa sets out to find his friend and apologise… he thinks it will be easy, he just has to listen out for the sound of her tummy, but who knew how many other rumbling noises there were?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Something very strange is happening in Brickabuild. Clockwork Mouse is giving all sorts of confusing orders to the builders and everything is chaos. Noddy realises that someone has put sticky putty on her clockwork key and it's making her run slowly. Noddy decides to investigate and find out who could have tried to damage the little mouse. Following all the clues and keeping track of all the evidence in his WhoWhatWhere Tablet, Noddy finds that the trail leads him to Carlton! But Carlton adores Clockwork Mouse! Noddy discovers that poor Carlton didn't meant to damage her; he just wanted to help her rest and not work so hard. Noddy has a brilliant idea. If Clockwork Mouse and Carlton work together, they can get all their jobs finished in half the time. And then there'll be plenty of time to rest – and play! Good idea Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi has invited the other tots over to lunch but she is not very well. Bumble gamely steps in and offers to cook for her. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Bruce Willis: All American Hero
programme.desc: Bruce Willis became a star with his iconic role as John McClane in Die Hard, leading to a legendary career with over 100 films. Known for his charm and humor, his career faced a tragic setback in 2022.

programme.title: Brad Pitt: Breaking Hollywood
programme.desc: He may be one of the sexiest Hollywood actors, but his career and personal goals offer much more than his looks. Brad Pitt. One of the leading names in all of Hollywood. The well-known story of an unknown talent who transformed into a superstar.

programme.title: The Moviemakers
programme.desc: With over 50 years in the industry, not many filmmakers can boast the longevity and influence of Steven Spielberg, whose journey from the suburbs of Arizona to the spotlight of Hollywood is one of the greatest stories ever told.

programme.title: The Moviemakers
programme.desc: Since the early 1990s, Quentin Tarantino has been on a cinematic rollercoaster ride, that’s never looked like slowing down, that has cemented himself as one of the worlds most influential filmmakers.

programme.title: Islands Of Creation
programme.desc: In the jungles of a remote archipelago in the South Pacific, a biologist is attempting to do something Charles Darwin and Ernst Mayr never accomplished: catch evolution in the act of creating new species. Albert Uy is on the verge of an amazing discovery in the Solomon Islands, but there's a threat looming on the horizon.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: Iberia's Woodlands
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: Growing Up Grizzly: A Tale Of Two Orphans
programme.desc: After 18 years of raising an orphaned bear named Brutus, Casey Anderson will do anything to ensure no bears have to live in a man made sanctuary. His resolve is put to the test one year when he is notified of 2 recently orphaned grizzly cubs.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Spring comes to the Dales and North York Moors National Parks, the season when the parks' animals must find food, a mate and raise a family.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Unseasonably cold summer weather causes difficulties for several animals in the Yorkshire Dales and North York Moors, including an injured roe deer and her twins.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Autumn is on hold as summer continues, with unexpectedly balmy conditions throwing a life line to the roe deer as they prepare for the winter ahead. For other animals, mating season has arrived, making for a testosterone-fuelled time at Ravenscar Beach.

programme.title: Destination China: Yunnan
programme.desc: Destination China will take the audience to some of Yunnan's most beautiful and stunning landscapes and homes to around 6000 species of plants, 200 mammals and 500 species of birds.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel
programme.desc: Manu is in India for the first time in his life and wants to discover as much food as he can handle. From an Idli making lesson to a workout in the flower markets of Kolkata. Will he make it to Hong Kong on time and in one piece?

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in his mum's home town of Beijing to begin a culinary, historical and personal journey through the ancient country of China.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam visits the beautiful, mountainous province of Anhui, home to one of the eight great regional cuisines of China. Anhui cuisine is hearty, peasant food that uses seasonal, wild produce from the mountains.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam's journey to explore China's history through its food continues, as he visits the provinces of Jiangsu and Zhejiang, both considered part of the 8 great regional cuisines of China and celebrated for their wealth and sophistication.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the largest cities in the world Shanghai where he discovers a modern, cosmopolitan and global facing city.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Texas is a vegan oasis; Mena explores the off-beat Texan Capitol's surprising plant-based bounty: fried chicken, larger-than-life biscuits, short rib baos and mouth-watering vegan brisket.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: Mena returns to his home town and makes vegan ice cream with musician Tesher, then swings home to get a taste of his mum's Egyptian cooking.

programme.title: The Lockerbie Bombing
programme.desc: Days before Christmas in 1988, one of the worst air disasters in history occurred over Scotland. Pan Am Flight 103 exploded at 31,000 feet, falling in fiery sections of wreckage that tragically changed the hillside town of Lockerbie forever.

programme.title: The Hunt For Eagle 56
programme.desc: Follow shipwreck hunters as they comb the seafloor and pore over eyewitness accounts to solve the mystery of U.S. Navy warship Eagle 56. They, along with another amateur sleuth, have found evidence that could finally solve this 75-year-old whodunit.

programme.title: The Hunt For Eagle 56
programme.desc: After finding the bow of Eagle 56 at the bottom of the Atlantic, civilian investigators search for the rest of the ship to understand its mysteries. Follow the hunt for the missing engine room as they hope to change the Navy’s version of the tragedy.

programme.title: The Real Mad Men Of Advertising
programme.desc: Examine '60s ad men and women and how they used wit and irony to reach a new audience, consequently revolutionizing the industry.

programme.title: The Real Mad Men Of Advertising
programme.desc: See how stricter rules and public mistrust inspired 1970s advertisers to create some of history's greatest campaigns.

programme.title: The Real Mad Men Of Advertising
programme.desc: See how advertisers used a new optimism and new technology to sell big in the "Greed is Good" era.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 5 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagbibigay ng mga mahalagang pangyayari, paksa, at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggan o nabasang teksto. Matutuhan din dito ang wastong pagbaybay sa mga salita at paglalarawan ng tagpuan at tauhan.

programme.title: Grade 5 Math
programme.desc: These episodes are about area, volume, and temperature. These episodes also explain line graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 5 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on analyzing visual and multimedia elements and writing paragraphs and articles.

programme.title: Grade 5 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ay pag-uusapan ang bahaging ginampanan ng kolonyalismong Espanyol at pandaigdigang koteksto ng reporma sa pag- usbong ng kamalayang pambansa patungo sa pagkabuo ng Pilipinas bilang isang nasyon.

programme.title: Grade 5 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain how weathering and soil erosion shape the Earth’s surface and affect living things and the environment. These episodes also discuss about weather disturbances and their effects, the phases of the Moon and the beliefs and practices, associated with it, and the constellations and the information derived from their location in the sky.

programme.title: Grade 7 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang mga akda ayon sa mga tauhan, kaisipan, at saloobin na nakapaloob dito. Tatalakayin din ang pagsusulat ng sariling pananaw at ideya tungkol sa napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 7 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach the key concepts, uses, and importance of statistics, data collection/gathering and the different forms of data representation, measures of central tendency, measures of variability, and probability.

programme.title: Grade 7 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach writing and composing essays. These also feature Philippine literature and theater.

programme.title: Grade 7 Araling Panlipunan

programme.title: Grade 7 Science
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the relation of geographical location of the Philippines to its environment, the different phenomena that occur in the atmosphere, the relationship of the seasons and the position of the Sun in the sky, and the occurrence of eclipses.

programme.title: Grade 9 English

programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of planning, setting up, and running a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss time and non-standard units of length, mass and capacity. These episodes also talk about pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about action words and describing words. These episodes also teach about sorting and classifying words and following directions.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang konsepto ng distansya sa paglalarawan ng sariling kapaligirang ginagalawan tulad ng tahanan at paaralan at ng kahalagahan ng pagpapanatili at pangangalaga nito.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: The remaining contestants compete for the final Immunity Pin of the season. In round one, the contestants are given 60 minutes to make a dish with a sound to get the judges salivating.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: It's elimination day, with internationally renowned pastry chef Kirsten Tibballs guesting as the remaining contestants do culinary battle to make it through to the Top 5.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: Today’s challenge is a Mystery Box with 60 minutes on the clock to create a dish using the Perino tomatoes plus at least two fresh ingredients that The Top 5 must harvest from the Garden.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: MasterChef hits the road for an adventure in regional Victoria. First stop is All Saints Estate in the Murray Region where Declan, Theo, Rhiannon and Cath will take part in a MasterChef time auction.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: Continuing on their Victorian road trip, the contestants find themselves in Cactus Country. Tonight sees a battle for for the last spot available in the forthcoming immunity challenge.

programme.title: My Landlord Wants Me Dead
programme.desc: When Madeline loses her job, she turns to her Aunt Grace for help. A secluded ranch house with a cute neighbour seems too good to be true - until strange events begin to occur.

programme.title: You Can't Escape Me
programme.desc: Having freed herself from her abusive spouse, an aspiring artist thinks she is safe in Seattle with a college friend - only to find herself in danger again. But time she is going to be prepared.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: Derek and Chauncey buy a bug infested zombie with high hopes of turning it around. But when they encounter plumbing problems and an actual burglary, will their high hopes of a profitable flip be smashed?

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S5)
programme.desc: Derek's thrilled to flip a 60-year-old house, but Chauncey's doubtful. Massive repairs—foundation, termites, plumbing—threaten profit and project completion.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S4)
programme.desc: The team senses a golden opportunity when they check out a zombie house and discover a hidden treasure in the backyard - a buried pool. If it can be restored, it could boost their sale price.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S4)
programme.desc: The team members leave their comfort zone with a six-bed-six-bath new construction that was abandoned after framing. It's not a typical zombie, but this flip could earn them several hundred grand!

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S4)
programme.desc: A 100-year-old house is being offered at a tantalising price--virtually land value. But that could just mean it's hiding a century's worth of problems.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S4)
programme.desc: The team find a "granny home" - a house that hasn't been updated in a long time, but has good bones and shouldn't take much work to flip. But the planned one-month renovation hits some snags.

programme.title: Spinning Out Of Control
programme.desc: Contest winner Natalie rides her free stationary bike daily, guided by virtual instructor Leah. Soon Natalie becomes infatuated, and initiates a sinister plan to eliminate everyone else from Leah's life.

programme.title: The Paramedic Who Stalked Me
programme.desc: After an accident, a young woman finds herself the target of the EMT who saved her life. She reminds him of his high school love who died - and he will do anything to have her back in his life.

programme.title: Vacation Home Nightmare
programme.desc: When a woman is attacked in her short-term rental, the company's Clean-Up Team steps in to help her. But she finds that the head of the team might be cleaning up his own crimes.

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: Single parents Selin and Anthony’s chemistry is palpable from the moment they lock eyes, but will Tamara’s pretentious viewpoints prove too much for her groom Brent?

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: Meet Marcos Takato Ikegami, a Brazilian supermarket owner in Izumo city. He sells all sorts of imported goods, but the chance to learn more about his native culture will always be free.

programme.title: Japan's Top Inventions
programme.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: Massage chairs.

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: After a slow start, Japanese washing machines have become some of the most advanced in the world. We look at their development and the latest innovations.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Documentary 360
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship documentary series offers must-see episodes on politics, the economy, social trends, science and the environment in Japan and beyond.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: NHK WORLD SHOWCASE
programme.desc: NHK WORLD SHOWCASE covers a variety of genres, including special features and pilot episodes of newly-developed programs.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN
programme.desc: In a land of mountains, forests and fast-flowing rivers, we try our hand at catching sweetfish, climb up to an organic farm perched on a steep hillside, and go right inside a charcoal maker's kiln.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: DESIGN X STORIES
programme.desc: Today's theme: Creative Archives. Social change has led to unique projects for archiving things of value. Our presenters visit these archives to explore how sharing design helps build new creations.

programme.title: u&i
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: Texico
programme.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Time Scoop Hunter
programme.desc: Sawajima Yuichi travels to the Warring States Period, when three ninja receive a top-secret order to steal an enemy castle's architectural plans. Will they be able to accomplish their mission?

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: Discover the unique, traditional method of roof thatching that uses Hinoki cypress bark.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Spiritual Explorers
programme.desc: Sake is made by fermenting steamed rice. We visit a 350-year-old brewery to gain an insight into the reverence the brewers have toward nature and microbes.

programme.title: Dining with the Chef mini
programme.desc: Learn about easy, delicious and healthy cooking with Chef Rika! Featured recipe: Udon Noodles with Vegetables and Wasabi.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: Phase Free is a disaster preparedness concept that does not distinguish between everyday life and emergency situations. We'll see how everyday items can be used in times of disaster as well.

programme.title: Short Program
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a variety of short programs focusing on Japan and Asia.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN
programme.desc: In a land of mountains, forests and fast-flowing rivers, we try our hand at catching sweetfish, climb up to an organic farm perched on a steep hillside, and go right inside a charcoal maker's kiln.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Spiritual Explorers
programme.desc: Sake is made by fermenting steamed rice. We visit a 350-year-old brewery to gain an insight into the reverence the brewers have toward nature and microbes.

programme.title: Dining with the Chef mini
programme.desc: Learn about easy, delicious and healthy cooking with Chef Rika! Featured recipe: Udon Noodles with Vegetables and Wasabi.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: Phase Free is a disaster preparedness concept that does not distinguish between everyday life and emergency situations. We'll see how everyday items can be used in times of disaster as well.

programme.title: Short Program
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a variety of short programs focusing on Japan and Asia.

programme.title: Child Of The Stars I / Child Of The Stars II
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Lolita spotted a flying saucer approaching their house. // The Barbapapa have taken off aboard Bababam in the hope of discovering the planet of Baby Big Feet.

programme.title: Paddington's Puffling Rescue / Paddington Goes Under The Sea
programme.desc: Paddington and the Browns rescue pufflings who, instead of taking their firs flight, get lost around the campsite // Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonatahn and Judy - but where is Judy's necklace?

programme.title: The Crew and Chase Are On The Case
programme.desc: There's a mystery afoot in Builder Cove! When the sculpture of all the townsfolk suddenly disappears, Chase joins Rubble & Crew to solve the case of the missing statue...and build a brand new Science Center to help investigate.

programme.title: Adventures In Plantsitting / Andrea the Alebrije
programme.desc: Dora and Boots take care of baby flowers Bouncy Blue, Dizzy Daisy, and Baby Rosette so Isa can attend a royal tea party. / Dora and Boots help baby Andrea find the magical leaf so she can receive her Alebrije powers and take care of the rainforest.

programme.title: Abra-Ka-Pickle!
programme.desc: Pickle is putting on a magic show for all of Axle City! But when Crusher accidentally makes a magical mistake, it's up to Blaze and Pickle to fix the magic and save their friends! Abra-ka-Pickle!

programme.title: Noodle Bowls / Spicy Cauliflower Bites
programme.desc: Chef wants to host dinner and a show, but struggles when he can't seem to get any of his magic tricks right. // Chef aims to make an EXTREME snack for Henry's EXTREME cousin, but he accidentally makes his spicy cauliflower bites too spicy!

programme.title: The Big Picture
programme.desc: Sharkdog is very excited to be in the annual Fisher family photo, but disaster after disaster threatens his perfect picture.

programme.title: Air Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Dennis challenges the Sharkpack to a game of 3-on-3 basketball, Sharkdog reveals he's an amazing player. So amazing, he may end up taking Max's spot!

programme.title: Sick as a Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious cold, Max knows Dad will be able to help him feel better. But things go haywire when the aquarium's robot doctor takes over the examination!

programme.title: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game
programme.desc: When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Tell-Tale Scooter
programme.desc: Baby Shark accidentally breaks William's new scooter and hides the evidence.

programme.title: Pups Save an Elephant Family / Pups and the Mischievous Kittens
programme.desc: The pups' road trip through the savanna becomes a mission to reunite and rescue an elephant family! // To win the Spotless Town award, the PAW Patrol pups must save Adventure Bay from Mayer Humdinger's Kitten Catastrophe Crew!

programme.title: Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers
programme.desc: Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Smoothie Shop / The Crew Builds A Dino Roof Party
programme.desc: Café Carl opens up a smoothie shop on the boardwalk! But when the coaster causes coconut chaos, Rubble & Crew know just what to do. // Rubble & Crew work together to find a construction solution when Charger's bouncy birthday surprise needs a lift!

programme.title: Bouncy Ball
programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: Polly's Boat Trip
programme.desc: Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Delphine Donkey
programme.desc: Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Fire Engine
programme.desc: When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Circus
programme.desc: Bubu's DVD of his favorite circus show does not work. The others create their own circus acts in the backyard. Doing acrobatics, juggling, and magic! Bubu joins them, even when the DVD player is fixed, they prefer to stay in the backyard to play!

programme.title: The Friendship Journal
programme.desc: Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal."

programme.title: Nopales Tacos / Sloppy Joes
programme.desc: Accepting a knightly quest, Sir Chef sets out to turn a prickly pear cactus into nopales. // When Chef is gifted a brand new apron, he vows to keep it clean. But keeping clean isn't easy when sloppy joes are the dish of the day.

programme.title: Donuts
programme.desc: Chef attempts to bake Olly's favorite donuts for her surprise birthday breakfast without waking her up.

programme.title: Runaway Rocket
programme.desc: When Crusher tries to cheat at a carnival game, he accidentally strands himself and Pickle on a giant rocket! Now it’s up to Blaze and AJ to rescue the two trucks before their runaway rocket crashes into the garbage dump.

programme.title: Pirate Musical!
programme.desc: In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure

programme.title: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends / Pups Save a Puffy Mayor
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble. // During Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the Pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger after a puffy shirt floats away with them.

programme.title: Pups Save a Jukebox / Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox so he can play an annoying song all day long. Chase and Rubble track it down to save the records. // A hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go awry sending her careening down Jake's Mountain

programme.title: Pups Save Floating Friends
programme.desc: The alien’s spaceship is on the fritz and shooting out anti-gravity rays. Ryder and the pups need to repair the spaceship.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Giant Dam / The Crew Builds A Squirrel-Proof Farm
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew are on the job to save Builder Cove after a rainstorm threatens to flood the town. // Rubble and Motor come up with crafty construction solutions to fix Farmer Zoe's squirrel problem before the Farm Fair.

programme.title: The Crew Builds a Fountain Show / The Crew Builds A Carousel
programme.desc: When Sierra Sparkle's big concert stage needs some extra sparkle, Rubble & Crew use a construction complication to make a big splash. // Rubble & Crew decide to go big when Grocer Gabriel wants something special built outside of his grocery store.

programme.title: The Alebrije Adventure / Let's Get A Paleta
programme.desc: Ale the Alebrije asks Dora for her help! The Alebrije tree is wilting, so it's up to Dora to find its rainbow water. // On a super hot day, everyone wants paleta, but Val's paleta truck is stuck! Dora goes to rescue her and get paletas for everyone.

programme.title: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin
programme.desc: When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: Working Like a Sharkdog
programme.desc: All Sharkdog wants to do is play with his new toy, but when Dad ends up on a wild adventure through town, Sharkdog must give up his playtime and come to Dad's rescue.

programme.title: Sharkdog's Got Talent
programme.desc: Sharkdog wants to perform in the talent show with Max, but all Max wants to do is chill. Will Sharkdog perform with one of Max's friends instead?

programme.title: Meteor Madness
programme.desc: The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower on Foggy Springs's highest mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too.

programme.title: Princess Peppa
programme.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Teddy's Playgroup
programme.desc: Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Danny's Pirate Party
programme.desc: It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Mr Potato Comes to Town
programme.desc: All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Celery & Hummus / Lettuce Wraps
programme.desc: Chef, Olly, Ruby and Henry compete in the annual Celeryjack Games. But Chef, who's used to winning, faces stiff competition this year. // When Chef and Olly's lettuce goes missing, they become veggie detectives to try and solve the case.

programme.title: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another
programme.desc: Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire
programme.desc: While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper
programme.desc: Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share? // Everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition and enjoy a special icecream prize, but teamwork is key!

programme.title: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn
programme.desc: Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: Pups Save an Extreme Lunch / Pups Save a Cat Burglar
programme.desc: Daring Danny X is performing a new stunt! He is harnessed over a canyon eating an Extreme Lunch when the wind blows him upside down! // It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger sends Rocky Kitty to take one of Mr. Porter's tasty pies, so he can join the contest.

programme.title: Pups Save the Butterflies / Pups Save an Underground Chicken
programme.desc: Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay! // The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

programme.title: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game
programme.desc: When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.desc: Barbapapa and Lolita spotted a flying saucer approaching their house. // The Barbapapa have taken off aboard Bababam in the hope of discovering the planet of Baby Big Feet.

programme.desc: Paddington and the Browns rescue pufflings who, instead of taking their firs flight, get lost around the campsite // Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonatahn and Judy - but where is Judy's necklace?

programme.title: Tell-Tale Scooter
programme.desc: Baby Shark accidentally breaks William's new scooter and hides the evidence.

programme.title: Pups Save an Elephant Family / Pups and the Mischievous Kittens
programme.desc: The pups' road trip through the savanna becomes a mission to reunite and rescue an elephant family! // To win the Spotless Town award, the PAW Patrol pups must save Adventure Bay from Mayer Humdinger's Kitten Catastrophe Crew!

programme.title: Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers
programme.desc: Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Smoothie Shop / The Crew Builds A Dino Roof Party
programme.desc: Café Carl opens up a smoothie shop on the boardwalk! But when the coaster causes coconut chaos, Rubble & Crew know just what to do. // Rubble & Crew work together to find a construction solution when Charger's bouncy birthday surprise needs a lift!

programme.title: Big Big Boots / Backpack's Sticky Situation
programme.desc: Boots is too short to go on a ride, so he wishes to be bigger and becomes giant! Dora helps him go back to his normal size. // Backpack has something special for Dora, but she can't open! They travel to Abuela on Tallest Mountain so she can fix her.

programme.title: The Puppet / Gloop Gloop Ah-Ah
programme.desc: The Barbababies decide to create a show and go all out! // Barbotine wants to create the best lemonade.

programme.title: Saving Ol' Cushy / The Nest
programme.desc: The hamsters must stop Kendrick's old recliner from being thrown out. // When a mama bird thinks Lil Pal is her lost chick, the hamsters rescue their friend.

programme.title: Sneezing Cold
programme.desc: Gabby, Blaze and AJ are out in the wilderness when they get a call, Blaze's friends have come down with a sickness called the Sneezles! Our heroes must race back to Axle City to bring the sick trucks the medicine oil they need.

programme.title: The Treat Thief
programme.desc: Officer Blaze just got his biggest case yet: tracking down the mischievous Treat Thief! With help from Officer Anna, Blaze sets out to stop the thief and recover every stolen treat!

programme.title: Pups Save the Baby Space Rocks / Pups Save the Eddies and Emmys
programme.desc: When a mysterious storm drops hailstones that hatch into Baby Space Rocks, the Pups must find a way to keep them safe. // A 3-D printer leads to trouble when Eddie and Emmy make 3-D reproductions of themselves and play pranks all over Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Charger Visits the Pups / Pups Save a Shiny Ride
programme.desc: Rubble's cousin, Charger, visits Adventure Bay just in time to help out when a Humdinger-caused geyser destroys Mr. Porter's cafe. // Mayor Humdinger hatches a plan to sabotage a "Shinest Ride Contest", so it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the day.

programme.title: Pups Save a Satellite
programme.desc: A satellite is out of orbit and falling towards Adventure Bay, the PAW patrol must fix it before it crash lands.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Parking Garage / The Crew Builds A Campsite
programme.desc: The Crew helps with a parking problem when Café Carl's ice cream machine brings lots of cars to Builder Cove. // When Rubble's fear of the dark derails the pup's Bark Yard campout, the Crew comes up with an idea to help him enjoy the starry night.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Treehouse / The Crew Builds A Chicken Feeder
programme.desc: Park Ranger Rose's favorite tree might be off limits for climbing unless Rubble and Grandpa can come up with a solution. / The Crew build a feeder for Farmer Zoe's chickens, but when they get loose, it's up to the pups to safely rescue them.

programme.title: Big Red Chicken Wake Up! / The Mystery Gift
programme.desc: Dora and Boots have to wake up the Big Red Chicken before he floats over a waterfall! // Dora and friends must solve a series of questions and challenges to open a mysterious gift.

programme.title: Best in Flow / Blizzard Wizard
programme.desc: Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets. // When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: Pest Friends Forever
programme.desc: Sharkdog has fleas! Sea fleas, that is. Max will do whatever it takes to get rid of them, but that may be tough because Sharkdog is so itchy, he can't sit still!

programme.title: Sleeping Like a Baby
programme.desc: Sharkdog must go on a wild search around town to help Mia find her missing binky and get the baby back to sleep.

programme.title: Ceviche for Dinner
programme.desc: When Dad's cool boss comes over for dinner, Max and Sharkdog both try to impress him. And they'll do whatever it takes.

programme.title: Grandpa at the Playground
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: Goldie the Fish
programme.desc: Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Fun Fair
programme.desc: The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people at the fair tell her that she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions, just like George is sad because the mini golf course is too big for him.

programme.title: Numbers
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends learn how to count by playing games at Madame Gazelle's daycare.

programme.title: Banana Bread / Starfruit Parfaits
programme.desc: When Chef learns he's going to be on the cover of a cooking magazine, he obsesses over getting the perfect pic. // At Chef's stargazing starfruit sleepover, Chef and Olly get so distracted with fun activities that their friends may miss the stars.

programme.title: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle
programme.desc: Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches
programme.desc: The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Paddington's Puffling Rescue / Paddington Goes Under The Sea
programme.desc: Paddington and the Browns rescue pufflings who, instead of taking their firs flight, get lost around the campsite // Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonatahn and Judy - but where is Judy's necklace?

programme.title: Sparkle's Racing Badge
programme.desc: It's more Blaze family fun in this high octane, action-packed adventure as Blaze and his sister Sparkle team up to make it back to the Monster Dome in time for a big race.

programme.title: Pups Save a Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger
programme.desc: When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Pups Save the PawPaws / Pups Save a Popped Top
programme.desc: Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble. // The top of Farmer's Al's silo has been knocked off and he needs help saving his corn crop.

programme.title: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin

programme.title: The Legend Of Zorro

programme.title: The Next Three Days
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as a family man with an ideal life who finds his world turned upside down when his wife is convicted of murdering her boss. Convinced of her innocence he decides to break her out of prison, but soon finds himself out of his depth.

programme.title: Star Trek

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: Red Rain
programme.desc: Based on true events, a young scientist who specialises in the study of aliens and extraterrestrials sets out to uncover the mystery behind a series of strange occurrences in Kerala.

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula

Miss Qiao had died in vain then, and her butler paid a paper craftsman to make a paper doll to be buried with her. Miss Qiao’s spirit is revived to take revenge when the doll’s eyes are drawn, and a series of horrible events begins to happen...

programme.title: 7ujuh
programme.desc: 7 friends go on a road trip to a remote bungalow run by a village head and his daughter Suri. They host a party and ask Suri to help. Things spiral out of control and Suri is raped. Before killing herself, she curses them to be haunted in their dreams. As the friends are killed off one by one, they must break the curse to escape their deadly fate.

programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'Économie, Entreprises
programme.desc: Programme focusing on the story of a French company which takes up exporting and enjoys success in the international markets.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: À La Recherche Du Légume Star
programme.desc: All the world's vegetables have come together with just one idea in mind: to find themselves on every plate and make every child love them. For that, they each pass before the judges and offer the very best of themselves, in the hope of being awarded the highest marks.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Âges
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Kenda
programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Têtes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: After a beam collapses in the cellar Évelyne decides to change career and go into the building trade. Vic panics at the idea of her mother attending her school and Félix decides to play head of the family for Flavie.

programme.title: Pfffirates
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: Mission Info + Jt Ado
programme.desc: Mission Info + Jt Ado

programme.title: 7 Jours
programme.desc: ''7 jours'', a weekly magazine programme covering news on society and international events to know all there is to know... in French

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'Hebdo
programme.desc: Report, inquiry, investigation ... ''Objectif Monde L'Hebdo'', a television magazine by French-speaking editorialists, takes time to reflect and analyse through the expert insights and opinions provided by specialists. A TV5MONDE programme, jointly produced with RTS, in collaboration with its francophone partners (RTBF, Radio-Canada, France Télévisions).

programme.title: Quartier Recherché
programme.desc: Corey and Evelyne take on a real challenge with a couple from Quebec. Rémi loves the city and its restaurants; Benoît prefers nature and tranquillity. Evelyne suggests the trendy district of Limoilou, whilst Corey takes them to the peace and quiet of Charlesbourg.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Côte d'azur.

programme.title: Bien Bâti
programme.desc: The new owner of an old private hospital is proud of belonging to a line of matriarchs who have run this place. Isabelle Paradis's bicentenary house allows her to transform her knowledge into reality. And we discover a stonecutter's work.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Dan, Alexandre, Eric and Anthony are four Vietnamese brothers. Refugees in France, welcomed by the Red Cross in Autun, they discovered almost by chance the world of solidarity and in 1990 they launched the Phuong workshop. Today, their creations are displayed in the most prestigious museums, testifying to their know-how.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: She took part in the Olympic Games in Rio, Tokyo and Paris, and is European champion in double sculls alongside Hélène Lefebvre: the rower Élodie Ravera-Scaramozzino is Pierre Classen's guest.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Magazine
programme.desc: Magazine

programme.title: Hep Taxi !
programme.desc: In town or in the countryside, day or night, Jérôme Colin, the presenter-taxi driver leads his prestigious customer on a four-wheel journey conducive to secrets.

programme.title: Au Fil De L'Eau : La Réunion, Une Goutte D'Eau Douce Dans L'Océan
programme.desc: Hydrobiologist and underwater photographer, Anne-Cécile Monnier sets off to explore the most fabulous freshwater spots on Réunion Island, in the Indian Ocean. In the company of local enthusiasts and specialists, she visits the towering waterfalls and torrential rivers of this intense island shaped by water, home to some surprising species.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Suisse En Scène
programme.desc: Interview with a key figure from the Swiss cultural scene. An opportunity to look back at their life and career, and the foundations that underpin their work.

programme.title: Falò
programme.desc: A news magazine show, ''Falò'' discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Les Étoiles Du Chocolat Belge
programme.desc: The competition steps up a notch. The challenge on this second episode is to redesign the Michelin star chef Manon Schenck's signature lobster dish using chocolate, and transform it into a chocolate dessert which is spectacularly displayed. The play-off for second place involves creating a chocolate Bonsai tree.

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planète B
programme.desc: Will we ever see the end of greenwashing: false environmental virtue signalling in advertising? Could it really go away? Explanations from Wim Vermeulen, a specialist in marketing and sustainability.

programme.title: Meurtres À Arles
programme.desc: Arles amphitheatre is buzzing with excitement as the queen of the town is about to be named! But she doesn't come forward after her name is announced. A corpse is found instead of her in the royal carriage: the corpse of the election organiser.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: Creator of Diurne, Marcel Zelmanovitch recounts the story of a rug made in Nepal. All about the bomber jacket and its legendary orange lining. Guilaine Tortereau, artistic director and founder of the wigmaker Peruke. How to wear a cap. Espace Niemeyer hosts an exhibition by Andreas Angelidakis (Audemars Piguet Contemporary).

programme.title: Échappées Belles
programme.desc: Gastronomy, sport, discovery, exceptional beauty spots and a chance to really get away from it all, the Aveyron offers a multitude of possibilities and something for everyone. France's fifth largest department, composed of vast natural regions, is characterised by an exceptional geography with a harmonious blend of landscapes.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Dan, Alexandre, Eric and Anthony are four Vietnamese brothers. Refugees in France, welcomed by the Red Cross in Autun, they discovered almost by chance the world of solidarity and in 1990 they launched the Phuong workshop. Today, their creations are displayed in the most prestigious museums, testifying to their know-how.
