programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: Witness at a trial, a police officer is aggressively cross-examined by Sarah Clain, lawyer, determined to prove her client suffered from a judicial error. To the waiting press, she asserts holding new evidence enabling the identification of the true culprit. As the investigation is re-opened, the lawyer is kidnapped...

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: After the re-opening of the investigation and kidnapping of the lawyer Sarah Clain, the police have to face the closed world of high level sport. Not only its secrets, but also the ploys used by both coaches and doctors to improve the performance of their young athletes.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Handsome Guys
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed tough guy Jae-Pil and sexy guy Sang-Gu move to a countryside home. A spirit sealed in the basement awakens, leading to a high-stimulus chilling comedy they'll never forget.

programme.title: Montage
programme.desc: 5 days before the statute of limitations of a 15-year-old kidnapping case expires, a flower is left anonymously at the original crime scene. A few days later, a similar kidnapping takes place.

programme.title: My Puppy
programme.desc: A groom-to-be sets off with his friend to finding a new owner for his puppy.

programme.title: The Negotiation
programme.desc: An arms dealer kidnapped two Koreans in Bangkok where the hostages were in fact held in an abandoned children's home in South Korea, when the kidnapper's motivations becomes clearer.

programme.title: Mr. Queen Ep3
programme.desc: After an accident, Jang Bong-hwan finds himself transported back in time to the Joseon dynasty, trapped in the body of Queen Cheo-rin, wife to King Cheol-jong, the reigning monarch of that period.

programme.title: Mr. Queen Ep4
programme.desc: After an accident, Jang Bong-hwan finds himself transported back in time to the Joseon dynasty, trapped in the body of Queen Cheo-rin, wife to King Cheol-jong, the reigning monarch of that period.

programme.title: Taeyong: Ty Track In Cinemas
programme.desc: Taeyong is the first NCT member to make a solo debut. He released a mini album and held a 2-day concert. Witness his outstanding performance and take a closer look at him behind the stage.

programme.title: Forbidden Dream
programme.desc: Two Korean inventors develop a 20-year relationship while advancing the field of astronomy.

programme.title: Beautiful Audrey
programme.desc: Mi-yeon and her son Ki-hoon run a noodle restaurant. Her daughter, Ji-eun left for her dream. One day, Mi-yeon is diagnosed with a disease. Will this family be able to protect each other?

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: Where Would You Like To Go?
programme.desc: A tragic accident claims the lives of a teacher. His widow seeks solace in a trip to Warsaw, where an unexpected reunion and a letter bring hope to her journey of healing and rediscovery.

programme.title: The Attorney
programme.desc: When tax attorney Song Woo-Suk agrees to defend a student activist who was arrested and tortured into giving a false confession, his entire life and worldview begin to change drastically.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil's Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Crazy Romance
programme.desc: Two co-workers navigate their feelings for each other through a minefield of office gossip and social media.

programme.title: Street Woman Fighter 2
programme.desc: The legendary dance series is back! In this all-female dance survival program, the 8 female dance crews compete to be the No. 1 team. Shownu and Monika will join as judges.

programme.title: Flower of Evil
programme.desc: A psychopath falsifies everything about his cruel past to marry his wife. However, his secrets are soon revealed after his wife, a detective, doubts him as a suspect of a murder case.

programme.title: Flower of Evil
programme.desc: A psychopath falsifies everything about his cruel past to marry his wife. However, his secrets are soon revealed after his wife, a detective, doubts him as a suspect of a murder case.

programme.title: Missing: The Other Side 2
programme.desc: Continuing the story of its first season, Kim Wook and Jang Pan-seok will try to find the bodies of missing people and chase after the truth behind their deaths in another village of dead spirits.

programme.title: Chef and My Fridge (2024)
programme.desc: The best chefs from <Culinary Class Wars> go head-to-head to create impromptu dishes that feature ingredients found inside the guest stars' very own refrigerators.

programme.title: Chef and My Fridge (2024)
programme.desc: The best chefs from <Culinary Class Wars> go head-to-head to create impromptu dishes that feature ingredients found inside the guest stars' very own refrigerators.

programme.title: Good Day

programme.title: Tatlong Mukha ng Pag-ibig
programme.desc: Three different kinds of love stories in one picture, all of them top-billed by Sharon Cuneta.

programme.title: James Bone Agent 001
programme.desc: Ninong, the syndicate's big boss, is dead. There are three usurpers to the vacant throne--Crooked Fingers, Boy Macho and Sabrina. To settle the rivalry, they agree on the ultimate contest.

programme.title: I Love You Sabado
programme.desc: Heaven makes mistakes too. Janno was killed before his time and must be sent back to earth. However, the Chief Angel found out that he was due to die in one week's time, or next Saturday or Sabado and he would go to hell.

programme.title: Tong-Its
programme.desc: Two popular figures in the local music scene, pop singer, Janno Gibbs and master rapper, Francis Magalona teamed up in this comedy about two cops who enjoyed playing a game Tong-its, a popular type of card game.

programme.title: Ang Syota Kong Balikbayan
programme.desc: There is a budding romance between FPJ and Anjanette Abayari who has just returned home after living for years in the United States. But before a love triangle could be resolved there was the problem of a bag of diamonds hidden in the gasoline tank of FPJ's jeepney.

programme.title: Hiram Na Mukha
programme.desc: Famous plastic surgeon Dr. Hugo (Christopher de Leon) worships the ground his fiancee Alicia (Nanette Medved) walks on. That is because he feels Alicia is his creation.

programme.title: Working Girls (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A humorous, but truly insightful look into the lives of women trying to make a living in the big city and coping with all the prejudice life bestowed on them because of their sex. This is also about their loves, their dreams, their weaknesses.

programme.title: Anak ni Boy Negro
programme.desc: Nap never knew his father, and wanting to please his mother, he never bothered to find out anything about the notorious small time hood. But in his heart, he knew he deserved more than the shanty he grew up in.

programme.title: Segurista
programme.desc: Made destitute by the eruption of Mount Pinatubo in Central Luzon, Karen decides to work as an insurance underwriter by day and as a guest relation’s officer in a club by night.

programme.title: Abot Hanggang Sukdulan
programme.desc: The abduction and rape of the eldest daughter shattered the once happy Paredes household. They vowed to get justice for their daughter but changed their plan when Romano offered marriage after it was discovered that Agnes was pregnant.

programme.title: Kamandag ng Kris
programme.desc: A Muslim school teacher and a Christian military general agree to hold talks. But what should have been a step towards peace became a source of added discord when the general is killed in a massacre and the teacher's son is slain in the counter-offensive.

programme.title: Paano Ba Ang Magmahal?
programme.desc: Jun (Niño Muhlach) feels neglected as his parents do not have time for him. He leaves home and ends up staying with Dodie (Aga Muhlach). With Dodie, Jun finds the attention and love he wants. But all ends well as it turns out that Dodie's girlfriend is Millet (Pops Fernandez) who also happens to be the niece of Josie's colleague, Ramon (Dante Rivero).

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 3
programme.desc: Caution -- these people are operating motor vehicles under the influence of DUMB. TruTV is counting down the 20 most hysterical Motorheads on the road, in the sky, and on the water. See an out-of-control mail truck, a wild road-rager, and a man treating a motorbike like it's his girlfriend. Our cast of souped-up comedians, including Kevin McCaffrey, Chris Fairbanks, Rachel Feinstein, and Mike Trainor have pulled up to the curb with plenty to say.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 4
programme.desc: Not to boast, but we've got 20 of the World's Dumbest Show Offs and they're about to steal the show! From an out-of-control security guard to a dancer who kills it at a funeral - they all need attention, and they'll get plenty of it from our cast ofhilarious comedians, including Mike Britt, Rachel Feinstein and Gilbert Gottfried.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 5
programme.desc: Feel the endorphin rush as 20 of the World's Dumbest Thrillseekers do their thing. We've got a motorcycle crash, an out of control skydiver, even an angry bison. And one thing ties them all together - outrageous fails. With hair-raising commentary from our cast of comedians, including Michael O'Gorman, Jared Logan and Judy Gold

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 20
programme.desc: Jessie hopes to find some hidden gems in a bin full of old furniture. Papa Bear goes fishing for profit. Brandon and Lori gamble big on a business in a box and a very special item from Sean.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 21
programme.desc: The bidders take a trip to Canyon Country to bid on huge trailers. A mysterious concrete block and a trailer full of hay mean big opportunities and lead to unusual alliances within the group.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 22
programme.desc: Lori and Brandon get in a fight over a bin and make a wager to see who can do better. Lori eyes a bin with a tanning bed, while a bin with fake walls intrigues Brandon. Meanwhile, Papa Bear and Jesse vie for a bin full of antique furniture.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 23
programme.desc: When Sean is only allowed in the storage facility after hours, it results in the first ever day to night auction, ending in the dark! Will their flashlights illuminate big scores?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 24
programme.desc: Sean takes the bidders to the home of the L.A. County Fair for a behind the scenes tour. In a location that was built in 1922, there's no telling what might be up for auction. Who will win big underneath the grandstands?

programme.title: Hack My Life Inside Hacks S1 15
programme.desc: Which one of our hosts recently got rid of some bad ink? Who is Kevin a big fan of? (Hint: His dog shares the same name.) Which pop star once babysat Brooke? Get all of that and more on Inside Hacks.

programme.title: Sucker Punch
programme.desc: Close your eyes. Open your mind. You will be unprepared. From the Spartan slaughter of 300 to the visionary world of Watchmen, writer/director/producer Zack Snyder has transported audiences into visual dreamscapes of his creation. His latest cinematic mind trip takes us into the vivid imagination of a young girl (The Uninvited's Emily Browning) whose dream world provides the ultimate escape from her darker institutionalized reality. Unrestrained by the boundaries of time and place, she is free to go where her mind takes her, but her incredible adventures blur the lines between what's real and what is imaginary. Locked away against her will, but determined to fight for her freedom, she and four other girls battle everything from serpents tosamurais on an unbelievable journey to set themselves free. Like "Alice in Wonderland with machine guns," Snyder's epic action fantasy is filmed in such a way that the action sequences aren't limited by physical real...

programme.title: Dirty Money S1 11
programme.desc: Resurrecting an old coffin purchased from a dying store, John and Rat Boy make a grave decision and leave Jimmy six feet under.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 10
programme.desc: Sheldon becomes jealous and considers taking his relationship with Amy to the next level when Stuart (guest star KEVIN SUSSMAN) from the comic book store asks her out on a date.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 11
programme.desc: Leonard must face his fears after being contacted by his high school tormentor (guest star LANCE BARBER), while Penny realizes that she might have been a bully herself.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 12
programme.desc: Sheldon gets in trouble with Amy, and it's up to Penny to teach him how to be a better boyfriend. Howard, meanwhile, must come to grips with Bernadette's dislike of children.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 13
programme.desc: Everything might change when Leonard offers Penny a spur of the moment invitation to a romantic dinner for two on the 100th episode of the series.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 14
programme.desc: Leonard and Penny experiment with dating again by "beta testing" their relationship, while Raj develops a peculiar relationship with his phone's virtual assistant.

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 17
programme.desc: The sequel to Young Sheldon follows Georgie and Mandy as they raise their young family in Texas.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 2
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys try to sell diamonds to unsuspecting couples ready to tie the knot, and pose as members of a very unwelcoming committee down at the boardwalk.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 3
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys share humiliating text messages in a quiet waiting room, shampoo women's hair at an upscale hair salon, and teach a driver's ed course that's a guaranteed fail.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 4
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys put their green thumbs to the test as workers in a garden center, demonstrate how NOT to save lives as CPR instructors, and they're full of baloney workinga deli counter.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 5
programme.desc: The guys go barking up the wrong tree at a pet store, take a swing as golf instructors, and give their regards to Broadway as producers in need of funding.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 6
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys raise money for absurd charities at a donut shop, join diners mid-meal in a Chinese restaurant, and offer unsolicited advice to shoppers in a mall.

programme.title: Friends S6 8
programme.desc: Suave Joey is as confident as usual while preparing to make love with Rachel for the first time. Ross goes to a spray-on tanning salon but fails to follow the simple directions properly.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S7 5
programme.desc: Sheldon helps his roommate try to beat the stock market, Missy and Billy Sparks throw a party, and Mary finds a new church.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S7 6
programme.desc: Georgie and Mandy’s wedding plans pit Mary against Mandy’s mom, Audrey (Rachel Bay Jones), with baby CeeCee caught in the middle.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: We all have a superhero inside us, it just takes a bit of magic to bring it out. In Billy Batson’s (Asher Angel) case, by shouting out one word—SHAZAM!—this streetwise 14-year-old foster kid can turn into the adult Super Hero Shazam (Zachary Levi), courtesy of an ancient wizard (Djimon Hounsou). Still a kid at heart—inside a ripped, godlike body—Shazam revels in this adult version of himself by doing what any teen would do with superpowers: have fun with them! Can he fly? Does he have X-ray vision? Can he shoot lightning out of his hands? Can he skip his social studies test? Shazam sets out to test the limits of his abilities with the joyful recklessness of a child. But he’ll need to master these powers quickly in order to fight the deadly forces of evil controlled by Dr. Thaddeus Sivana (Mark Strong).

programme.title: Friends S6 9
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, Chandler tries to gain favor with Monica's parents – but an old secret involving Ross causes problems. Undomestic Rachel's dessert proves intriguing.

programme.title: Friends S6 10
programme.desc: Joey plots the perfect opportunity to kiss Janine on a televised New Year's Eve dance show. Ross and Monica resurrect their dorky high school dance routine for the broadcast.

programme.title: Friends S6 11
programme.desc: Janine forces Joey to choose between her and his friends. Rachel buys an apothecary table from a store that Phoebe abhors.

programme.title: Friends S6 12
programme.desc: Chandler is upset when a men's magazine prints Ross' cartoon; both Chandler and Ross claim to have originated the joke.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 05
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin go undercover as they find out which hacks work best for opening a beer bottle. Plus, they discover new hacks for cleaning, throwing a great party, and using a ballpoint pen in ways you'd never imagine.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 06
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin put their hacking skills to the test as they find out which hacks work best for popping popcorn and polishing silverware. Plus, they'll uncover the best hacks for working out and using dental floss.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 3
programme.desc: While touring Flecha Azul’s distillery in Mexico, Mark is inspired to take F45 public, launch Unrealistic Ideas’ new health and wellness podcast, and pivot Wahlburgers for a post-pandemic era.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 4
programme.desc: After the loss of his beloved mother, Alma, Mark takes a break from everything except filming his latest movie – and finds unexpected solace in one of his scenes.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 5
programme.desc: After returning from Boston for his 50th birthday, Mark makes a decision about his future with Flecha Azul tequila.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 6
programme.desc: Mark flies to New York to take F45 public and solidifies a new partnership in Vegas for Wahlburgers, while his wife Rhea helps launch Municipal’s new women’s line in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 7
programme.desc: After flying to Ohio to check on his car dealership – and burgeoning RV and Airstream business – Mark prepares to test his faith-based film in front of an audience for the first time.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 07
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin take hacking to the next level as they uncover the best hacks for cooking pizza and cutting cake. Plus, they'll show why bread is a true All-Star, and teach you some hacks that every parent needs to know.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 08
programme.desc: Our hosts find hacks for retrieving lost objects, separating egg yolks, and removing wallpaper stains. They'll also make duct tape an All-Star, find another use for walnuts, and show you how to hack your home while you're away.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 09
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin swim in the back of a truck, cook steak in a bag, and turn bike parts into a clock. Plus, they add coffee filters to the All-Star club, uncover road trip tips, and craft hacks to defend against your sick spouse.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 10
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin uncover the difference between a hack and a wack, as they use an onion for cleaning and beer for moisturizer. Plus, they show you the real way to hack your hotel breakfast, and how to defend against your needy neighbor.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 8
programme.desc: Luthor challenges Lois to a live telecast debate, though not everything is as it seems. John Henry and Clark face a troubling possibility.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 9
programme.desc: Lois struggles against the fallout of the debate. Clark uses Luthor’s tactics against him, while Jonathan and Jordan prepare for an impending battle.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 10
programme.desc: The epic series finale. The Kents fight with everything they have as Luthor makes his final move on Smallville.
